item.title: Applied UV Inc S-1
item.description: Applied UV Inc, which is in the Electric Lighting & Wiring Equipment [3640] industry, SEC S-1 filing on November 23, 2021 had 29672 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: stock - 833 instances preferred - 613 instances series - 591 instances may - 354 instances shares - 281 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
